sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./TaskPage.scss"; import TaskSvg from "../../../assets/task"; export default function TaskPage(props) { const { title, description, sprint, status, project, assignedTo, storyPoints, assignee, } = props.task; console.log(props.task) const [changeStatus, setChangeStatus] = useState(false); const [newStatus, setNewStatus] = useState(""); return (

{title}

Status: { changeStatus ? <> : <> {status} }

Assigned to: {assignee}

Description

{description}

Sprint: {sprint}

Project: {project}

Story points: {storyPoints}

); }
